title: The Food That Built America: Snack Sized
overview: You may think you know all there is to know about the Food That Built America, but there's more to the story. In this new series, The History Channel delves even deeper into the stories behind the ruthless innovators and entrepreneurs featured in the Food That Built America. Spotlighting the rest of the story you didn't know, the series tells the super-charged, bite-sized history of all of the foods you love in 30 minutes or less.
